scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && cp .npmrc www/.npmrc && cp database.json www/database.json &&cp package.json www/package.json && cd www && zip -r Archive.zip . && cd ..
scripts.test: SET ENV=test&& db-migrate db:create store_backend_test&&db-migrate --env test up && jasmine-ts && db-migrate db:drop store_backend_test
scripts.deploy: eb setenv AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=$AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=$AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY BCRYPT_PASSWORD=$BCRYPT_PASSWORD PEPPER=$PEPPER ENV=$ENV POSTGRES_DB=$POSTGRES_DB POSTGRES_HOST=$POSTGRES_HOST POSTGRES_PASSWORD=$POSTGRES_PASSWORD POSTGRES_TEST_DB=$POSTGRES_TEST_DB POSTGRES_USER=$POSTGRES_USER SALT_ROUNDS=$SALT_ROUNDS TOKEN_SECRET=$TOKEN_SECRET AUTH_AUDIENCE=$AUTH_AUDIENCE AUTH_ISSUER=$AUTH_ISSUER && eb deploy
